title: FP91G
author: FP91G
content: Canxiumhttps://canxium.org/What is Canxium?Canxium is a Pow blockchain - a completely decentralized supply control mechanism and support offline mining.https://canxium.org/#aboutpoolshttps://miningpoolstats.stream/canxiumWhich wallet?MetaMask is the leading self-custodial wallet and compatible with Canxium. Public Rpc: https://rpc.canxium.org, chain ID: 3003https://canxium.org/#aboutdiscordhttps://discord.gg/SbxSPJ8FkDThe coin resembles a new fork of Ethereum, trading is possible in a telegram bot.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGrizzly on June 09, 2023, 09:22:40 PMThanks for sharing. I might mine some.I'm glad to be helpful. There is only one way to make money on such a coin. Wait until there is a listing on the exchange and try to sell the coin with a good profit. But the coin may not live to see the listing, so the miner will pay the electricity bill. It is already unprofitable to sell immediately, the profit has fallen.

comments.author: CryptoGrizzly
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on June 10, 2023, 12:04:24 PMI'm glad to be helpful. There is only one way to make money on such a coin. Wait until there is a listing on the exchange and try to sell the coin with a good profit. But the coin may not live to see the listing, so the miner will pay the electricity bill. It is already unprofitable to sell immediately, the profit has fallen.Canxium seems to be doing okay.https://safe.trade/trading/cauusdtI wonder if it will last or if will do like some of the other alt coins and disappear.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGrizzly on July 05, 2023, 12:48:15 PMQuote from: FP91G on June 10, 2023, 12:04:24 PMI'm glad to be helpful. There is only one way to make money on such a coin. Wait until there is a listing on the exchange and try to sell the coin with a good profit. But the coin may not live to see the listing, so the miner will pay the electricity bill. I do not believe in similar coins, but we do not invest in them, but try to get more profit from mining. When a coin appears on the exchange, the mining profit will drop to the standard values â€‹â€‹on other coins.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Just a reminder: We are getting closer and closer to âš¡Hydro Forkâš¡. The Hydro Fork will occur at block 4,204,800. At Hydro Fork, Canxium will change its fixed block reward to a variable block reward which will be directly proportional to demand. ðŸ“ˆ Get ready for a new era of adaptive coin supply, responding to market demand and ensuring sustainability.https://twitter.com/canxiumchain/status/1747617718503866442

comments.author: Boomscud
comments.body: I joined the project, I think this blockchain can stand out from the crowd

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Hybrid Chain RoadmapWe are starting to develop a roadmap for Canxium to become a #hybrid block chain in next 5 months.This is the most important milestones:1. Deposit open, estimate time: 2/2024. Minimum deposit to become validator, estimate: 1000-3200 CAU.2. PoS sidechain start after reach minimum 100 deposits.3. Merge from PoW to PoS, estimate 5/2024.4. Enable offline mining (PoW) on mainnet, estimate end of May, at the Hydro fork.After step 4 is completed, Canxium become a fully hybrid chain: PoS + PoW (offline mining).https://twitter.com/canxiumchain/status/1750539134639452419Profit on PoW will decrease after this.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: ccplz on February 09, 2024, 12:59:09 AMQuote from: FP91G on February 08, 2024, 10:39:03 AMHybrid Chain RoadmapWe are starting to develop a roadmap for Canxium to become a #hybrid block chain in next 5 months.This is the most important milestones:1. Deposit open, estimate time: 2/2024. Minimum deposit to become validator, estimate: 1000-3200 CAU.2. PoS sidechain start after reach minimum 100 deposits.3. Merge from PoW to PoS, estimate 5/2024.4. Enable offline mining (PoW) on mainnet, estimate end of May, at the Hydro fork.After step 4 is completed, Canxium become a fully hybrid chain: PoS + PoW (offline mining).https://twitter.com/canxiumchain/status/1750539134639452419Profit on PoW will decrease after this.what does offline mining even meanIn simple terms, Canxiumsâ€™s offline mining enables miners to mine CAU without needing a continuous internet connection. With offline mining, miners donâ€™t need to rely on centralized mining pools and internet connections. You can mine CAU from any place in the world with just your mining devices.https://canxium.medium.com/the-unique-mining-offline-2c61ffb11e6dThe article is interesting, but I did not understand the technical aspects of this mining.I donâ€™t see any big problems in this, but all miners are more interested in profit and energy consumption rather than technical aspects.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: "We aim to list on at least 3 good exchanges in the top 12 in 2024.This third campaign requires only $85K, including listing costs and funds for Market Marker funds. We are asking for $75K, the remaining $10K and CAU will be paid by the foundation.We are aiming to collect enough quantities by March 15th, the listing process will take 1 week, so the official listing will be at the end of March."https://discord.com/channels/1110917700714238022/1110917701267890318/1210070799575158794Contribute athttps://campaign.canxium.org/

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: April Update:Our report about what happened previous month:1. Raised 85k USD for next TOP 12 Cex. Because the number of projects going to list on this exchange is too much, the CAU integration process has been slower than planned. We are still waiting for news from the exchange.2. Finished the new emissions roadmap for CAU when switching to offline mining.3. Introduced PraseOdy Hybrid Testnet4. Refunded 100% for the firs crowdfunding campaign: Mexc5. Canxium Wallet public test.What Next this April?1. TOP 12 Cex2. Launch PoS on Mainnet.3. Audit the offline mining source code.4. Canxium Wallet on Google Play Store.The next 2 months are the most important months in the Canxium protocol development roadmap.https://twitter.com/canxiumchain/status/1774728024195572092

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: All Canxium #CAU source code, including offline_mining, will be reviewed by Certikhttps://skynet.certik.com/projects/canxium#https://t.me/journalmainera/3473Canxium is a blockchain platform with a unique demand-driven economic model that adjusts the total coin supply based on market demand, creating a dynamic and responsive system. Unlike traditional blockchains, Canxium does not have fixed supply or predetermined inflation/deflation mechanisms, allowing market forces to determine the coin's availability and value

comments.author: canximan
comments.body: Offline mining now enabled on the mainnet guys.Try it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=15kHFXmqtwg

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Canxiumâ€™s first hardfork at block 4,204,800 took place successfully today at: Jun 23 2024 13:22:11 PM (+07:00 UTC)This hardfork enable #offline mining to the mainnet.https://canxium.medium.com/first-hardfork-successful-at-the4-204-800-c6bb31beef59Canxium #CAU has become a hybrid blockchainBlocks are generated using POS and mined using POW.Now the coin can be mined by ASICs JasMiner X16 and IpolloBombax, Jasminer X4, Antminer E9Pro can no longer mine CAUhttps://t.me/journalmainera/3719
